channel.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
channel.description: Well the title says all. My party is on the 6th (sunday is recovery day). Obviously there will be alcohol. I don't want to hear the crap "Oh you're just a kid, you shouldn't be drinking" and all that. I'm going to live my life and do what I do. But what should I do, after. I'm expecting $600 (most I'll ever get for any celebration). And I know that the 'smart' idea would be to get a car. But I'm looking at the alternatives. Maybe a new computer? Etc. And hey, idea's for during the party can be cool. Party games. etc. Go.

item.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:31, topic:513388”]My 18th was me, in a Casino with $300 to blow. After 8 hours, and only $20 left I decided to put in my last bit into a John Wayne slots machine. After 2 spins I ended up with free spins. Sweet, well those free spins kept comming until the point that when I cashed out I had over $500.

Anyways I would suggest getting something you will use alot. Personally I bought an Xbox and upgraded the laptop I had at the time. Don’t buy something just to figure out you dont like it lol.[/quote]
I was thinking of re-doing my stereo system. Mine doesn’t sound good anymore compared to my dads.

Read full topic
item.source: My 18th is coming soon, what do

@enzo42 wrote:

get drunk, troll around at the streets, get arrested

item.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

My 18th was me, in a Casino with $300 to blow. After 8 hours, and only $20 left I decided to put in my last bit into a John Wayne slots machine. After 2 spins I ended up with free spins. Sweet, well those free spins kept comming until the point that when I cashed out I had over $500.

Anyways I would suggest getting something you will use alot. Personally I bought an Xbox and upgraded the laptop I had at the time. Don’t buy something just to figure out you dont like it lol.

Read full topic

item.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

sk8rdude461:

And hey, idea’s for during the party can be cool. Party games. etc.

What kind of tea party are you planning?

When I had my 18th party I totally over did it, booked a hall, DJ, loads of food and drink and it was the best night ever.
Oh and make sure you get car.

item.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Buy a computer or put to a car definitely. Depending on your friend types, playing videogames and losers have to drink is a good idea. Throw in black ops 2, search and destroy. If you lose a round then you take a shot.

item.source: My 18th is coming soon, what do

item.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

KroniKz_:

Pay the hot girl you like $600 to do a body shot off her belly button

I wouldn’t need to pay for her to let me

Ruby:

Parties and party games etc are my thing. One of my favourites is tash-on twister (Geordie Shore) you basically get a twister board, spin it, if it lands on someone they must be dared by the person who spun it and must take a shot of tequila (usually from a girls tits). Another good one is get a good beat to a song with 3-5 straight up hard hitting beats, line up 3-5 shots for each person taking a shot and when those beats come into the song you must do one every beat. For example; Bingo Players - Get Up has a line in it which is “birthday shots”, this has 3 syllables and is easily detected in the song, take a shot on the beat of the syllable. Uhh, you could go with the penny game, I have no idea what americans have on their coins but we have the Queen on ours, you throw a coin in your friends drink and tell him to save the queen, he’s got to down the drink then. This is a personal favourite- the ring of sick. get a circle of people, one person takes a drink, the person to their left takes two drinks, the person to their left takes 3 drinks and then it continues until everyone besides one has either given up or been sick. Make sure you have plenty of suicide shots (tequila, salt, lime) and just have good music. I’ve got a lot more games but I just woke up and cba to write them down.

Dear lord, this sounds like a lot of fun haha.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:7, topic:513388”]Won a 16 person, 2 person team beer pong tournament with some friends a while back. We were the only two guy team, so naturally we were team “gay”. My partner had badass aim, so I just took a few extra drinks so he could keep landing them. Pong is definitely a great choice.

Also lol wut $600 for a car?[/quote]

we were team "gay".
My partner had badass aim

Why rey, why

OT

I don’t know of any car you can get for $600, unless you already have some saved up, then you’d need to tell us what your budget for that is…

item.title: My 18th is coming soon, what do
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:5, topic:513388”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631634.msg4275118#msg4275118 date=1364878312]

Party games? EVERYBODY SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS SHOTS.

I hear this ping pong shot game is fun, i dono what it is called. You throw a ball or click a coin into the opposing team’s cups and if you get it in they drink and visa versa.

As drub said. Beer pong.
It’s rather fun only when you’re drunk. And the winning team never gets drunk. Lol.
[/quote]
That’s it! I’m not a drinker, so i don’t know any fun drunk games. Everyone drinks them at the end anyway, that’s the fun of the same.[/quote]
You only drink the cups the opposing team sinks. If you win. The opposing team drinks all your cups too.

RiiPiiNFtW:

Beer Pong… Also, for catering I suggest Silab if you buy her a ticket from china. She can make you sandwiches now that she has several step by step guides!

Yes, because I’m totally going to do that. I just have a couple grand sitting around to waste on my party lol.
-I’m spending birthday money on alcohol. lol.

[quote=“reyx7, post:7, topic:513388”]Won a 16 person, 2 person team beer pong tournament with some friends a while back. We were the only two guy team, so naturally we were team “gay”. My partner had badass aim, so I just took a few extra drinks so he could keep landing them. Pong is definitely a great choice.

Also lol wut $600 for a car?[/quote]
Yes, you can buy cars for $600. My brother got his 1976 Chevy truck for around $800.
And it could always go into savings.

Read full topic
